input.sentences: the old house on the street has a lot of history behind it .
although it looks modern it has been around for some time .
the back side of it has been completely refurnished .
this is a picture of it when it was first constructed .
the original house had fewer modifications than its current state .
output.sentences: The house was on a busy street, but sat on such a beautiful lot.
The house was very modern for its time, but is outdated now.
You can tell this house was refurnished completely.
The house was constructed very nicely as you can see from the picture.
The house is all original with only a slight modification to the original porch.
